mainSequence.step: Access Update Center Form - Actor Admin interacts with the UI to access the form for updating Recycling Center information.
Display Form - Admin interface displays the form for entering Recycling Center data to Admin.
Input Recycling Center Data - Admin inputs the Recycling Center data.
Submit New Center Info - Admin submits the new Recycling Center information via UI to the Server.
Validate and Add Info - Server validates and adds the new Recycling Center information to the Database.
Confirmation - Database sends a confirmation to the Server.
Display Success Message - Server displays a success message to the UI.
Show Confirmation - UI shows the confirmation message to the Admin.
